alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Grant; Jefferson; Lonoke (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 7:32AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lonoke, southeastern Grant, northeastern Dallas and northwestern Jefferson Counties through 800 AM CST... At 731 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Lamont, or 8 miles south of Sheridan, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... White Hall... Altheimer... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Warbritton... Hensley Island... Sulphur Springs... Sherrill... Ain... Tucker... Pastoria... Wright... Lock and Dam 5 Park... Kearney... Center Grove... Clear Lake... Hardin... Dexter... Rob Roy... Millerville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CST for central, southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.
